author: vmassol
msg: all cactus properties are now defined as java system properties. The cactus configruation file is now optional and if present all its proeprties are read and put as java system properties.

author: vmassol
msg: added Nick's new article to resource and news sections

author: vmassol
msg: no need to have a cactus.properties file anymore (it is possible to configure values using Java system properties - The new ServletTestRunner does this automatically for you).

author: vmassol
msg: fixed xml encoding bug ("<", ">" and "&" were not escaped)
